item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi, I an Sulav. I am a undergraduate student of computer engineering at the Institue of Engineering, Paschimanchal Campus. I have always been a keen observer of science and technology. Since past few years, I haven been focusing my self on learning and acquiring skills as a ML Developer. Besides I have an enthusiasm and an expertise on Android/Web Development with application of Machine Learning. I am interested in Image Processing, Natural Language Processing, and Generative Modeling.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Nothing to see here… Move along!
